entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning early this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 1.
